member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.#ctor
member.summary: Default shader constructor.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.#ctor(char)
member.summary: Shader constructor. Loads all existing shaders with given name.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.#ctor(char,char)
member.summary: Shader constructor. Loads all existing shaders with given name.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.#ctor(char,char,char)
member.summary: Shader constructor. Loads only vertex and fragment shaders with given names.

member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 compute shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getD3D11ControlShader const
member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 control shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getD3D11EvaluateShader const
member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 evaluate shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getD3D11FragmentShader const
member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 fragment shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getD3D11GeometryShader const
member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 geometry shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getD3D11VertexShader const
member.summary: Returns Direct3D11 vertex shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.getGLProgramID const
member.summary: Returns OpenGL program identifier.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.bind const
member.summary: Binds shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.clear const
member.summary: Clears shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.compile const
member.summary: Compiles shader.
member.returns: 1 if the shader compiled successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.destroy const
member.summary: Destroys shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.findParameter(int)
member.summary: Finds shader parameter.
member.param: Parameter number in the user's auxiliary parameters cache. The value must be in the range [0; 512]

member.summary: Finds shader parameter.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.findParameter(char,int)
member.summary: Finds shader parameter.
member.param: Parameter number in the user's auxiliary parameters cache. The value must be in the range [0; 512]

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.flushParameters const
member.summary: Flushes shader parameters.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadCompute(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads compute shader.
member.returns: 1 if the compute shader was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadControl(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads control shader.
member.returns: 1 if the control shader was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadEvaluate(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads evaluate shader.
member.returns: 1 if the evaluate shader was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadFragment(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads fragment shader.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadGeometry(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads geometry shader.
member.returns: 1 if the geometry shader was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.loadVertex(char,char) const
member.summary: Loads vertex shader.
member.returns: 1 if the vertex shader was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Shader.unbind const
member.summary: Unbinds shader.

member.param: Parameter number in the user's auxiliary parameters cache. The value must be in the range [0; 512]

member.summary: Sets shader double4 parameter value by using given parameter id.
